name: places/ChIJ71jwfeJYwokRijlfyb9Qbyw
formattedAddress: 321 E 48th St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 321 E 48th St, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: I had the most wonderful experience at this salon. The level of professionalism goes above and beyond just providing a beauty service. Christina and her staff are passionate about what they do and genuinely strive to please. They are down to earth, friendly and personable individuals. Beyond the service being great, the work done is exceptional. I had color with Lina and extensions put in with Christina and I couldn't be happier with the end result. They are also reasonably priced.  They definitely have a repeat customer in me!

originalText.text: Got my hair trial yesterday for my upcoming wedding. Beautiful salon, great location, excellent customer service from everyone at the salon. Josephine was my stylist, she did an absolutely amazing job. I could not have asked for a better look, she did an incredible job with such an attention to detail I have not seen anywhere else! Josephine took her time, made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire styling session. She gave much needed opinions and helped me decide how to do my hair. So happy with Josephine's work!!! No one else would have ever been able to make me look the way she did! Even more excited to have her do my hair on my big day!

originalText.text: I have been a client of Christina's for years and when she opened this salon I was so excited! The location is amazing and the salon is absolutely breathtaking! The staff is always so helpful and accommodating and Christina is truly a doll! I go to her for extensions and my hair has never been better!! Believe it or not Christina saved my hair the extensions actually made my hair grow! I love coming to her and this beautiful salon makes it even better! The stylists here are also amazing I have seen their work in person and wow!!! Definetly come to this salon and go to Christina for extensions she's the best!!

text.text: I have been a client of Christina's for years and when she opened this salon I was so excited! The location is amazing and the salon is absolutely breathtaking! originalText.text: From the second I walked in the receptionist and all of the employees were so warm and friendly. They made me feel like I was with family and friends. Victoria did such an amazing job with my extensions. Sandra was so helpful with my haircut and she blended the extensions in so naturally. Anthony put any concerns or worries I had at ease. Christina the owner took the time out of her busy day to make sure I was satisfied with my extensions. Everyone went above and beyond to make sure I had a wonderful experience. I felt no discomfort with the extensions. This has been a dream come true for me! Thank you!

originalText.text:
Amazing, amazing service! From the moment I stepped into the salon until the moment I left, the staff is incredible, very polite and friendly. Jenny was my hair stylist and she honestly made my hair feel silky and smooth! & I looked super fab with my blow out!
- I have to mention the luxurious atmospohere, which I love!
Thank you Olivia Christensen Salon! I will be back very soon.
